This is re-balance MOD for craft skills.
Now, you get some penalties, but you can reduce them according to growth in amount of magicka and stamina.
descriptionHtml:
This is re-balance MOD for craft skills.
Now, you get some penalties, but you can reduce them according to growth in amount of magicka and stamina.


[b]Smithing skill is dependent on stamina.[/b]
You can improve equipment with 40%(mild edition) / 20%(harder edition) performance of vanilla.
If you train your stamina, you can improve it more powerfully.
(Each 30 additional stamina gains more 7.5%(mild edition) / 10%(harder edition) performance.  Max 340.)


[b]Enchanting skill is dependent on magicka.[/b]
You can enchant equipment with 40%(mild edition) / 20%(harder edition) performance of vanilla.
If you train your magicka, you can enchant item more powerfully.
(Each 30 additional stamina gains more 7.5%(mild edition) / 10%(harder edition) performance.  Max 340.)
If you enchant to two-handed melee weapon you can get more 30% bonus.
(So, your default performance is 50% and max magicka 250.)
This factor is now only contained in mild edition.


[b]Alchemy skill is dependent on stamina and magicka.[/b]
You can make potions with 55%(mild edition) / 20%(harder edition)  performance of vanilla.
If you train your stamina or magicka, you can make potions more powerfully.
(Each 20 additional stamina or magicka gains more performance.  Max 220 stamina and 220 magicka.)
author: SasameSnow
